attributes.action: Ultra Low Emission Zone penalty unfair for driver unfamiliar with London traffic
attributes.background: Many road users who were unfamiliar with London traffic have received ULEZ PCN, since its launch in April 2019. The advertisements about ULEZ have been insufficient for drivers outside London. There are lack of pre-warning signs until the ULEZ border. The signs are small and can easily be missed.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
